original_text: Remember that God has saved you from your sins. That will be like a strong hat that keeps your head safe. Also, use God's message to help you. That will be like a sword that God's Spirit puts in your hand.
korean_text: 구원의 투구와 성령의 검 곧 하나님의 말씀을 가지라

sentences.original_text: Remember that God has saved you
That will be like a strong hat
Also, use God's message to help you
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 하나님의 말씀을 사용하여 당신을 도우세요

sentences.original_text: That will be like a sword
that God's Spirit puts in your hand
